PCHC Receives Grant for Home-based Geriatric Primary Care

Posted September 12th, 2013 by PCHC & filed under News, Press Releases.

PCHC has received a $24,912 grant from the John T. Gorman Foundation for its “At-Risk Geriatric In-Home Expansion” Project. The purpose of the project is to increase PCHC’s capacity to provide home-based primary care to patients age 65 or older who have one or more chronic conditions, such as diabetes, heart disease, congestive heart failure, end-stage… Read more »

PCHC Recognized as Leading Practice Site for 340B Pharmacies

Posted August 23rd, 2013 by PCHC & filed under News, Press Releases.

PCHC is pleased to announce that its Pharmacy Department has been recognized as a leading practice site nationally for its 340B program. The 340B Program is a federal program designed to stretch scarce health care dollars. It allows health care organizations serving the underserved to access medications more affordably. The American Pharmacists Association and HRSA’s… Read more »

Posted August 15th, 2013 by PCHC & filed under News.

Pediatric Walk-In Care will be open and available to the community at Penobscot Pediatrics, 1068 Union Street, Bangor (near the Airport Mall) beginning August 19th. High-quality acute medical care, including urgent visits and treatment of non-emergency conditions, will be available for children Monday-Friday 7:30am to 7:30pm and Saturday, Sunday, and most holidays 9am to 4pm….
